January 2023 Edition

Welcome to the Latest Edition of 
The Justia Insider

Greetings everyone! Welcome to another edition of The Justia Insider. During this month, there were a ton of noteworthy events and efforts. Our team compiled them in this edition so that you all have insights into what‚Äôs been happening in our company thus far. On another note, April always brings surprises, and we are ready to make the most of the month! Do you have any feedback or items of interest? Speak up! Happy Children‚Äôs Day to everybody!

Milestones & Accomplishments

Let‚Äôs Find Out What‚Äôs Been Achieved So Far by Our Teams at Justia

Justia Elevate. Our Justia Elevate Team continued to release new features and patches for our clients. This month, several new options for various stripes got published along with other performance optimizations, minor features, and even an upgrade to the Justia Elevate WordPress installation.

Blasts. The number of blasts and email marketing campaigns we process exploded this year! This month, we continued with our efforts to reach our contact base to promote our products and services. One of the crucial campaigns during this month was promoting Justia Elevate to attorneys in the Justia Lawyer Directory.

GA4 Support for AMP in Clients' Blogs. Continuing our migration to GA4, we have updated our client WordPress installations to support Google Analytics 4 event tracking features.

IT Maintenances. As usual, we continued to ensure the stability of our online services through ongoing server maintenance. This month, Justia projects like the Justia Lawyer Directory, Justia Law, and Justia Dockets got infrastructure updates. Even clearinghouse.net, a Justia-friend property, got a new development environment.

Justia.com SSL Certificate Renewal. The SSL certificate, a vital component of our systems, for our main domain justia.com was renewed and uploaded to several servers.

Justia Ask A Lawyer Automated QA. We continued with our efforts to increase our automated QA coverage for our properties. This month, the first version of the automated QA for Justia Ask A Lawyer was pushed live.

JUSTIA PORTAL NEWS

Take a Look at the Ongoing Development of Our Consumer Portal
  • Supreme Court Redesign. Check out the look and content of the newly updated Justia U.S. Supreme Court Center, including new sections on landmark cases and the history of the Court.
  • Snippets Completed. We wrapped up our project of writing brief informational snippets for each page in our Justia Legal Guides, which will help call attention to key points in these areas of law.
  • New Title Tags. We wrote new title tags for each page in the Justia Legal Guides. We added references to law-related terms to boost traffic.

DID YOU KNOW?

Law Students Visit the MX Office

We started receiving student visits at the MX Office. In the most recent one, we had law students from La Salle University (ULSA). We offered them an office tour and a coffee break. They also attended a presentation about Justia. We always enjoy sharing information about Justia with students!

We Attended a Job Fair at a Local University

We participated in the Internship and Job Fair at the Technical University of Coahuila. We shared information about Justia with students currently looking for an internship opportunity.

REVIEWS & RECOMMENDATIONS

Harvard Business Review

"Why should you add Harvard Business Review (HBR) to your daily reading routine? Because HBR is a fantastic article resource that can help you grow professionally. You can find leadership and management articles written by industry experts and MBA professors. The articles are usually not too long and easy to read. HBR is great at enlightening and providing perspective on various topics, from writing effective emails to managing organizational culture. No time to read? Harvard Business Review also has a great YouTube channel. ‚ÄúHarvard Business Review is the leading destination for smart management thinking.‚Äù"

- Hector Lugo
